text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Levittown | native_name = | settlement_type = Census-designated place | image_skyline = BristolPA PhineasPembertonHouse.jpg | image_size = | image_caption = Phineas Pemberton House | flag = | flag_size = | symbol = | symbol_size = | subdivision_type = country | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = state | subdivision_name1 = Pennsylvania | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = Bucks | unit_pref = Imperial | area_total_sq_mi = 10.40 | area_land_sq_mi = 10.30 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.10 | area_water_percent = | location = | coordinates = | elevation_ft = 30 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_sq_mi = 5116.41 | government_type = | government = | established_type = | established = | mayor = | timezone = EST | utc_offset = −5 | timezone_DST = EDT | utc_offset_DST = −4 | postal_code_type = ZIP Codes | postal_code = 19054–19055 and 19057–19058 | area_codes = 215, 267, and 445 | area_code_type = | image_map = Bucks county - Levittown.png | map_caption = Location of Levittown in Bucks County | pushpin_map = USA Pennsylvania#USA | pushpin_map_caption = Location of Levittown in Pennsylvania | website = | footnotes = |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 42-42928 |pop_est_as_of = |pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = |population_footnotes = |population_total = 52699 |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 26.94 |area_land_km2 = 26.68 |area_water_km2 = 0.26 |population_density_km2 = 1975.38 }} Levittown is a census-designated place (CDP) and planned community in Bucks County, Pennsylvania, United States, within the Philadelphia metropolitan area. The population was 52,699 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Pennsylvania
